title: Talking of safety
creator_credit: Millbank Films, David Evans and Ron Tanner
brief_description: Deals with the effectiveness of safety committee meetings. Shows how a newly-appointed safety supervisor at a brick and tile manufacturing plant in England makes his committee work more effectively while promoting clearly defined objectives.
